subject: Basketball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Memphis Grizzlies re-signed forward Darius Miles on Saturday despite a threat of legal action by the Portland Trail Blazers, who had waived him due to injury.
snippet: The Memphis Grizzlies re-signed forward Darius Miles on Saturday despite a threat of legal action by the Portland Trail Blazers, who had waived him due to injury.
